Class UserRepository

java.lang.Object
repositories.UserRepository
public class UserRepository extends Object
Repository class responsible for storing and managing all user-related data in the system.

This includes three distinct user types:

  • Student – Students applying for internships
  • CompanyRep – Company representatives in charge of internship postings
  • CareerStaff – NTU career centre staff responsible for approvals

The repository provides methods to add new users and search for users by User ID. It is used heavily by:

  • AuthController – during login
  • CareerStaffController
  • CompanyRepController
  • StudentController

Internally, each user group is stored in its own ArrayList.
